categories: Category:Sith of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Jinatte the Merciless was a female Pureblood Sith living during or after the Cold War.

Jinatte the Merciless was added to Star Wars: The Old Republic with Knights of the Eternal Throne expansion as a World Boss for Dark vs. Light system. Whenever the dark side of the Force reaches victory state on a server, Jinatte the Merciless has a chance to spawn at one or more of selected locations on Alderaan alongside other Dark Side World Bosses. Though killing her is required for an in-game achievement, it is impossible to determine when her death took place.
